level.heading: Emergency legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 7010 of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-377, July 14, 2014, 61 DCR 7598, 20 STAT 3696).

For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 7010 of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-449, October 10, 2014, 61 DCR 10915, 20 STAT 4188).
For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 7010 of the Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Second Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-566, January 9, 2015, 62 DCR 884).

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 20-102
level.text: Law 20-102, the “Electric Company Infrastructure Improvement Financing Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-387. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 7, 2014, and February 4, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 3, 2014 it was assigned Act No. 20-290 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-102 became effective on May 3, 2014.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 20-155
level.text: Law 20-155, the “Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-750. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 28, 2014, and June 24, 2014, respectively. Returned without the Mayor’s signature on Sept. 19, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-424 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-155 became effective on Feb. 26, 2015.
